natural_language_plan: • Attack c to remove harmony and inflict pain on c. • Succumb c to restore harmony and remove pain from c. • Attack b to inflict pain on b and disrupt harmony again. • Overcome b d to establish craves b d while restoring harmony.

reasoning_steps: - Preconditions satisfied: province c, planet c, harmony.
- Effects: Adds pain c; removes province c, planet c, harmony.
- Effects: Adds province c, planet c, harmony; removes pain c.
- Preconditions satisfied: province b, planet b, harmony.
- Effects: Adds pain b; removes province b, planet b, harmony.
- Preconditions satisfied: province d, pain b.
- Effects: Adds harmony, province b, craves b d; removes province d, pain b.
rationale: • Attack c to remove harmony and inflict pain on c.
• Succumb c to restore harmony and remove pain from c.
• Attack b to inflict pain on b and disrupt harmony again.
• Overcome b d to establish craves b d while restoring harmony.
